name: Ka: Keepers & Assassins
description:
Ka: Keepers & Assassins is dark fantasy multiplayer 3rd person battle arena game, 4 players against each other. Collect three crystals in a certain time and get them to the center of the Arena, in the meantime it is necessary to find better gear against the opponents.



Story:
The shadow realm gained control over the past world, whose power of spirit, blood and nature was hidden in the crystals. The last rulers of the past created Assassins who were sent to defeat the Keepers of the crystals and get their power back.
Upon entering the realm, they were exposed and forced to fight against each other in the Arena not only for their own survival, but also for the survival of their world, to which they can no longer return.



Gameplay:
Every hero has four skills, hp, mana and stamina regeneration.
Gear items and their AI keepers are spawned at time intervals. There are several places in the arena where such drops are made. Meanwhile, in other places, crystals are also dropped at intervals, which must be collected and bring to the center of the arena, in order to win the game.
After exceeding the match time limit, the shadowstriker starts, which takes hp of every player except for the center of the Arena.

Characters:
Ice & smoke female character

Fire & blood male character

Arcane & strike female character

Illusion & chaos male character


Features:
- 4x characters "heroes" (currently 1vs1)
- 5x character level up XP based
- the character has 4x spells,damage,defense,health,mana,stamina(all 3 with regeneration),walk,run(speed)
- 30min. game match time limit (currently 20min.)
- 1x dark arena map
- 4x player spawn positions
- 50+ gear items (currently 25 items)
- gear stats are strength,vitality,dexterity,inteligence,armor
- 5x drop time interval
- 8x crystal spawn positions (random drop every interval)
- 3x crystal
- 1x center area to prevent shadowstriker damage
- 50x chest wtih items (random drop of 5x of 5x item level ) with 10x spawn positions
- 4x keepers (AI monsters)
- 112x keepers spawn positions, 14x portals, 10x lakes
- 4x keepers patrol paths
